title: Leading Croatian national team players at FIFA World Cup 2018 , by market value
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Ivan Rakitic and lowest at Month Dominik Livakovic.
The Market value in million euros of Month Dominik Livakovic is 33.33% smaller than the maximum value at Ivan Rakitic.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Ivan Rakitic and lowest at Month Dominik Livakovic.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Ivan Rakitic and lowest at Month Dominik Livakovic.
The Market value in million euros of Month Dominik Livakovic is 33.33% smaller than the maximum value at Ivan Rakitic.
max_summary: This bar chart has 23 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market value in million euros in each Month on the y axis.
Month Ivan Rakitic has the highest Market value in million euros and Dominik Livakovic has the lowest Market value in million euros.
There is a difference of 48.5 between the maximum Month Ivan Rakitic and minimum Month Dominik Livakovic.
Month Ivan Rakitic is higher than any other Months with value 50.0, followed by Ivan Perisic, and Mateo Kovacic. Down to Month Dominik Livakovic with the lowest value 1.5.
Overall Market value in million euros has reduced over the Months.
Similar Market value in million euros is found in Month Andrej Kramaric, and Marcelo Brozovic.
The highest value 50.0 at Ivan Rakitic is almost 3.16 times larger than the average value 15.83.
